name: Mahindra Scientific Industries
overview:
Established in the year 1988, we, Mahindra Scientific Industries

Our Products: Optical Lensometer Surgical Lensometer Trial Lens Case Magnetic Compass Scientific Compass Bunsen Burners Tally Counter

Our Infrastructure: We are empowered by modern infrastructure comprising of a team of experienced and skilled engineers, technicians and medical professionals as well as a state-of-the-art manufacturing plant.

Quality Assurance: We are engaged in offering quality range like Lensometer, Hand Tally Counter, Bunsen Burner, Trial Lens Case and Compass. The raw material used in fabrication of the products is sourced from reputed and trusted vendors only.

Our Team: Our team have helped our company to stay ahead of the competitor in this industry. Our team members have in-depth domain expertise and rich industry experience which helps us to meet the variegated requirements of market as well as of our clients in the most efficient & judicious manner.

Why Us? Some salient features that give us a cutting edge over our competitors are: Transparent business policies High quality products Affordable prices Utmost client satisfaction
